fire_blade.successEffect: thrust an enemy with a blade made of fire

lightning_bolt.successEffect: strike a random enemy with a bolt of lightning

blizzard.successEffect: freeze all enemies in an area with a blizzard
blizzard.failEffect: freeze all your allies surrounding you instead

fire_ball.successEffect: strike all enemies in an area with a ball of fire for split damage
fire_ball.failEffect: strike all your allies surrounding you instead

necromancy.successEffect: summon a X-level class 1-demon to fight for you
